TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit HijriCalendar extends System.Globalization.Calendar

summary.span: Represents the Hijri calendar.

span.span: Represents the Hijri calendar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 回曆會辨識一個紀元： 紀元The Hijri calendar recognizes one era: A.H. (拉丁文"Anno Hegirae 」，這表示 「 年的移轉，」 參考移轉的 Muhammad (PBUH) 從一)。(Latin "Anno Hegirae", which means "the year of the migration," in reference to the migration of Muhammad (PBUH) from Mecca). > [!NOTE] > 如需有關使用資訊類別和其他的行事曆 .NET Framework 中的類別，請參閱 < [ 使用行事曆](~/docs/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars.md)。For information about using the class and the other calendar classes in the .NET Framework, see [Working with Calendars](~/docs/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars.md). 在 結尾的年份，可由 30、 第 2、 5 日、 7、 10 日、 13、 16、 18、 21、 24 每 30 年循環，26 和 29 年來都是閏年。In every 30-year cycle that ends with a year that is evenly divisible by 30, the 2nd, 5th, 7th, 10th, 13th, 16th, 18th, 21st, 24th, 26th, and 29th years are leap years. 一般年份有 354 天，閏年有 355 天。A common year has 354 days and a leap year has 355 days. 回曆有 29 到 30 天每個 12 個月：The Hijri calendar has 12 months with 29 to 30 days each: |GetMonth 值GetMonth value|月份Month|一般年份中的天數Days in common years|閏年的天數Days in leap years| |--------------------|-----------|--------------------------|------------------------| |11|محرم (Muharram)محرم (Muharram)|3030|3030| |22|صفر (Safar)صفر (Safar)|2929|2929| |33|ربيع الاول (Rabi 我)‏ربيع الاول (Rabi I)|3030|3030| |44|ربيع الثاني (Rabi II)‏ربيع الثاني (Rabi II)|2929|2929| |55|جمادى الاولى (Jumada 我)جمادى الاولى (Jumada I)|3030|3030| |66|جمادى الثانية (Jumada II)جمادى الثانية (Jumada II)|2929|2929| |77|رجب (Rajab)رجب (Rajab)|3030|3030| |88|شعبان (Shaban)شعبان (Shaban)|2929|2929| |99|رمضان （開幕）رمضان (Ramadan)|3030|3030| |1010|شوال shawwal （月）شوال (Shawwal)|2929|2929| |1111|ذو القعدة (Zulkadah)ذو القعدة (Zulkadah)|3030|3030| |1212|ذو الحجة (Zulhijjah)ذو الحجة (Zulhijjah)|2929|3030| 開幕，齋戒在法令來的世界裡，月正式開始和結束根據根據協議判決新月觀察為基礎。Ramadan, the month of fasting in the Muslim world, officially starts and ends according to a decree that is based on the observation of the new moon. 因此，Shaban 中的日數和天數開幕而有所不同。Therefore, the number of days in Shaban and the number of days in Ramadan vary. 日期年 1 月 1，2001 A.D.The date January 1, 2001 A.D. 西曆中大約會等於 shawwal 月 1421 年紀元中的第六個天in the Gregorian calendar is roughly equivalent to the sixth day of Shawwal in the year 1421 A.H. 在 回曆。in the Hijri calendar. 這個實作類別調整行事曆日期加上或減去的值從零到兩天，以容納在開頭和結尾開幕變異並適應國家/地區之間的日期差距。This implementation of the class adjusts the calendar date by adding or subtracting a value from zero to two days to accommodate the variances in the start and the end of Ramadan and to accommodate the date difference between countries/regions. 值會儲存在屬性。That value is stored in the property. 如果未明確地從 [控制台] 的 [地區及語言選項] 部分中的設定中衍生其值，並儲存在登錄值 HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\International\AddHijriDate 設定。If is not set explicitly, it derives its value from the settings in the regional and language options portion of Control Panel and is stored in the registry value HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\International\AddHijriDate. 不過，這項資訊可以變更的存留期間。However, that information can change during the life of the . 類別不會偵測系統設定 中的變更會自動。The class does not detect changes in the system settings automatically. 每個支援一組的行事曆。Each supports a set of calendars. 屬性傳回的文化特性的預設月曆，屬性會傳回陣列，包含所有支援的文化特性的行事曆。The property returns the default calendar for the culture, and the property returns an array containing all the calendars supported by the culture. 若要變更所使用的行事曆，設定應用程式應該屬性到新。To change the calendar used by a , the application should set the property of to a new .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 產生的日期部分產生的日期不在產生的月份，產生的 year 的有效日期會受到影響。The day part of the resulting is affected if the resulting day is not a valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 它會變更為產生的 year 之產生的月份中最後一個有效的日期。It is changed to the last valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 產生的年份部分產生的月份超出指定的年份會受到影響。The year part of the resulting is affected if the resulting month is outside the year of the specified . 此實作會支援目前的紀元。This implementation supports only the current era. 因此，產生的 year 超出指定的紀元便會擲回。Therefore, is thrown if the resulting year is outside the era of the specified . 產生的日期時間部分維持不變，與指定。The time-of-day part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 比方說，如果指定的月份是 Zulkadah，有 30 天內，指定某一天是該月的第 30 天，而`months`參數為 3，則產生的 year 是個以上的指定年份中，產生的月份是 Safar，並產生 day 是 29 日，也就是 safar 的最後一天。For example, if the specified month is Zulkadah, which has 30 days, the specified day is the 30th day of that month, and the value of the `months` parameter is 3, the resulting year is one more than the specified year, the resulting month is Safar, and the resulting day is the 29th day, which is the last day in Safar. 如果值`months`參數是負值，產生早於指定。If the value of the `months` parameter is negative, the resulting is earlier than the specified . 屬性傳回之值一律等於。The property of the returned value always equals . 您可以保留的屬性`time`藉由呼叫的參數方法，如下列範例所示。You can preserve the property of the `time` parameter by calling the method, as the following example shows. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/cs/add1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/vb/add1.vb#5)] ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示數個元件的值方面回曆。The following code example displays the values of several components of a in terms of the Hijri calendar. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.HijriCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HijriCalendar_AddGet/CPP/hijricalendar_addget.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.HijriCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HijriCalendar_AddGet/CS/hijricalendar_addget.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.HijriCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HijriCalendar_AddGet/VB/hijricalendar_addget.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 產生的日期部分產生的日期不在產生的月份，產生的 year 的有效日期會受到影響。The day part of the resulting is affected if the resulting day is not a valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 它會變更為產生的 year 之產生的月份中最後一個有效的日期。It is changed to the last valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 產生的月份部分維持不變，與指定。The month part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 此實作會支援目前的紀元。This implementation supports only the current era. 因此，產生的 year 超出指定的紀元便會擲回。Therefore, is thrown if the resulting year is outside the era of the specified . 產生的日期時間部分維持不變，與指定。The time-of-day part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 比方說，Zulhijjah 有 29 天，除了有 30 天的潤年期間。For example, Zulhijjah has 29 days, except during leap years when it has 30 days. 如果指定的日期是閏年 Zulhijjah 的 30 天，而`years`為 1，則產生的日期會在下一年度第 29 天 Zulhijjah。If the specified date is the 30th day of Zulhijjah in a leap year and the value of `years` is 1, the resulting date will be the 29th day of Zulhijjah in the following year. 如果`years`是負數，產生早於指定。If `years` is negative, the resulting is earlier than the specified . 屬性傳回之值一律等於。The property of the returned value always equals . 您可以保留的屬性`time`藉由呼叫的參數方法，如下列範例所示。You can preserve the property of the `time` parameter by calling the method, as the following example shows. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/cs/add1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/vb/add1.vb#8)] ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示數個元件的值方面回曆。The following code example displays the values of several components of a in terms of the Hijri calendar. remarks.format: ## Remarks 年中的日被指從當年第一日的天數。The day of the year is defined as the number of days from the first day of the year. 例如，的第一個月的第一天，則傳回 1，並的上個月的最後一天會傳回該年份中的總天數，這相同的值由。For example, for the first day of the first month returns 1, and for the last day of the last month returns the total number of days in that year, which is the same value returned by . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示數個元件的值方面回曆。The following code example displays the values of several components of a in terms of the Hijri calendar. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.HijriCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HijriCalendar_AddGet/CPP/hijricalendar_addget.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.HijriCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HijriCalendar_AddGet/CS/hijricalendar_addget.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.HijriCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HijriCalendar_AddGet/VB/hijricalendar_addget.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 比方說，這個方法傳回 29 或 30 Zulhijjah (`month` = 12)，這取決於是否`year`是否為閏年。For example, this method returns 29 or 30 for Zulhijjah (`month` = 12), depending on whether `year` is a leap year. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會呼叫`GetDaysInMonth`每五年的每個紀元中的第十二個月內。The following code example calls `GetDaysInMonth` for the twelfth month in each of five years in each era. remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會呼叫`GetDaysInYear`五年的每個紀元。The following code example calls `GetDaysInYear` for five years in each era. span.span: Always 0 because the type does not support the notion of a leap month.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 行事曆支援閏月的概念，在特定月份或任何一年中的月之後，可能會發生的閏月。In a calendar that supports the notion of a leap month, the leap month can occur either after a particular month or after any month in a year. 比方說，方法傳回的數字，介於 1 到 13，表示指定的日期與相關聯的月份。For example, the method returns a number between 1 and 13 that indicates the month associated with a specified date. 如果年份的第八個和第九個月之間沒有閏月方法會傳回 8，第八個月內，如呈獻第八個月的 9 和 10，第九個月。If there is a leap month between the eighth and ninth months of the year, the method returns 8 for the eighth month, 9 for the leap eighth month, and 10 for the ninth month.

summary.span: Gets or sets the number of days to add or subtract from the calendar to accommodate the variances in the start and the end of Ramadan and to accommodate the date difference between countries/regions.

span.span: Gets or sets the number of days to add or subtract from the calendar to accommodate the variances in the start and the end of Ramadan and to accommodate the date difference between countries/regions.

value.span: 從-2 到 2 的整數，代表要曆法中加減的日數。

span.span: An integer from -2 to 2 that represents the number of days to add or subtract from the calendar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個實作類別調整行事曆日期加上或減去的值從零到兩天，以容納在開頭和結尾開幕變異並適應國家/地區之間的日期差距。This implementation of the class adjusts the calendar date by adding or subtracting a value from zero to two days to accommodate the variances in the start and the end of Ramadan and to accommodate the date difference between countries/regions. 值會儲存在屬性。That value is stored in the property. 如果未明確地從 [控制台] 的 [地區及語言選項] 部分中的設定中衍生其值，並儲存在登錄值 HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\International\AddHijriDate 設定。If is not set explicitly, it derives its value from the settings in the regional and language options portion of Control Panel and is stored in the registry value HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\International\AddHijriDate. 不過，這項資訊可以變更的存留期間。However, that information can change during the life of the . 類別不會偵測系統設定 中的變更會自動。The class does not detect changes in the system settings automatically. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何影響的日期。The following code example shows how affects the date. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.HijriCalendar.HijriAdjustment#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HijriCalendar.HijriAdjustment/CPP/hijriadjustment.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.HijriCalendar.HijriAdjustment#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HijriCalendar.HijriAdjustment/CS/hijriadjustment.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.HijriCalendar.HijriAdjustment#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HijriCalendar.HijriAdjustment/VB/hijriadjustment.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 結尾的年份，可由 30、 第 2、 5 日、 7、 10 日、 13、 16、 18、 21、 24 每 30 年循環，26 和 29 年來都是閏年。In every 30-year cycle that ends with a year that is evenly divisible by 30, the 2nd, 5th, 7th, 10th, 13th, 16th, 18th, 21st, 24th, 26th, and 29th years are leap years. 一般年份有 354 天，閏年有 355 天。A common year has 354 days and a leap year has 355 days. 為閏日是閏年只會發生一天。A leap day is a day that occurs only in a leap year. 在回曆，Zulhijjah 的 30 天會是唯一的閏日。In the Hijri calendar, the 30th day of Zulhijjah is the only leap day. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會呼叫`IsLeapDay`第二個月 （二月），每個紀元中的五年的最後一天的方法。The following code example calls the `IsLeapDay` method for the last day of the second month (February) for five years in each of the eras. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.HijriCalendar.IsLeapDay#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HijriCalendar.IsLeapDay/CPP/hijricalendar_isleapday.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.HijriCalendar.IsLeapDay#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HijriCalendar.IsLeapDay/CS/hijricalendar_isleapday.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.HijriCalendar.IsLeapDay#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HijriCalendar.IsLeapDay/VB/hijricalendar_isleapday.vb#1)]

summary.span: Gets the earliest date and time supported by this calendar.

span.span: Gets the earliest date and time supported by this calendar.

span.span: The earliest date and time supported by the type, which is equivalent to the first moment of July 18, 622 C.E.
in the Gregorian calendar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Microsoft Visual Basic 會表示為指定的時間上所支援的最小日期當日時間類型，這是公元 0001 年 1 月 1 日Microsoft Visual Basic represents time of day as the specified time on the minimum date supported by the type, which is January 1, 0001 C.E. 不過，類型不支援的最小日期。However, the type does not support that minimum date. 因此，如果您呼叫的方法，來設定使用現行曆法的日期時間的格式，但您未指定的格式規範，格式就會使用 ISO 8601 可排序 ("s") 日期/時間模式的格式規範，而不是預設一般 ("G") 的日期/時間模式格式規範。Consequently, if you call a method to format the time of day using the current calendar but you do not specify a format specifier, formatting uses the ISO 8601 sortable ("s") date/time pattern format specifier instead of the default general ("G") date/time pattern format specifier. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 標準日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。For more information, see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會取得的最小值和行事曆的最大值。The following code example gets the minimum value and the maximum value of the calendar. MemberSignature.Value: public override int ToFourDigitYear (int year);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 ToFourDigitYear(int32 year) cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToFourDigitYear (year As Integer) As Integer
public: override int ToFourDigitYear(int year);
override this.ToFourDigitYear : int -> int

param.name: year
param.span: A two-digit or four-digit integer that represents the year to convert.

span.span: A two-digit or four-digit integer that represents the year to convert.

summary.span: Converts the specified year to a four-digit year by using the property to determine the appropriate century.

span.span: Converts the specified year to a four-digit year by using the property to determine the appropriate century.

returns.span: An integer that contains the four-digit representation of .

span.span: An integer that contains the four-digit representation of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是由兩位數年份的 100 年範圍中的最後一年。 is the last year in the 100-year range that can be represented by a two-digit year. 世紀取決於尋找兩位數的唯一相符項目`year`該 100 年範圍內。The century is determined by finding the sole occurrence of the two-digit `year` within that 100-year range. 例如，如果設為 1429，100 年範圍為從 1330年 1429年; 因此，30 的 2 位數值會解譯為 1330，而 2 位數為 29 值解譯為 1429年。For example, if is set to 1429, the 100-year range is from 1330 to 1429; therefore, a 2-digit value of 30 is interpreted as 1330, while a 2-digit value of 29 is interpreted as 1429. 支援的兩位數年份或四位數年份。 supports either a two-digit year or a four-digit year. 傳遞的兩位數年份值 (小於 100) 會導致方法將值轉換為四位數字值，根據值，表示適當的世紀。Passing a two-digit year value (less than 100) causes the method to convert the value to a four-digit value according to the value representing the appropriate century. 如果應用程式提供支援的行事曆範圍內的四位數年份值，此方法會傳回實際的輸入的值。If the application supplies a four-digit year value that is within the supported calendar range to , the method returns the actual input value. 應用程式提供四位數字值，超出支援的行事曆的範圍，則會提供為負數值，此方法會擲回例外狀況。If the application supplies a four-digit value that is outside the supported calendar range, or if it supplies a negative value, the method throws an exception.

exception.span: is outside the range supported by this calendar.

span.span: is outside the range supported by this calendar.

MemberSignature.Value: public override int TwoDigitYearMax { get; set; }
.property instance int32 TwoDigitYearMax
Public Overrides Property TwoDigitYearMax As Integer
public: virtual property int TwoDigitYearMax { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.TwoDigitYearMax : int with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.

span.span: Gets or sets the last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.

value.span: 以二位數年份表示時，該 100 年範圍的最後一年。

span.span: The last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性允許的 2 位數年份若要正確轉譯成 4 位數年份。This property allows a 2-digit year to be properly translated to a 4-digit year. 比方說，如果這個屬性設定為 1429年，100 年範圍是從 1330年 1429年。For example, if this property is set to 1429, the 100-year range is from 1330 to 1429. 因此，30 的 2 位數值會解譯為 1330 中,，而 2 位數為 29 值解譯為 1429年。Therefore, a 2-digit value of 30 is interpreted as 1330, while a 2-digit value of 29 is interpreted as 1429. 這個屬性的初始值被衍生自 [控制台] 的 [地區及語言選項] 部分中的設定。The initial value of this property is derived from the settings in the regional and language options portion of Control Panel. 不過，這項資訊可以變更的存留期間。However, that information can change during the life of the . 類別不會偵測系統設定 中的變更會自動。The class does not detect changes in the system settings automatically. 應用程式應該將這個值表示純粹 2 位數字年份 99。The application should set this value to 99 to indicate that 2-digit years are to be taken literally. 比方說，如果這個屬性設定為 99，100 年範圍是從 0 （不是有效值大部分的行事曆） 到 99。For example, if this property is set to 99, the 100-year range is from 0 (not a valid value for most calendars) to 99. 因此，30 的 2 位數值會解譯為 30。Therefore, a 2-digit value of 30 is interpreted as 30.

exception.span: This calendar is read-only.

span.span: This calendar is read-only.

exception.span: The value in a set operation is less than 100 or greater than 9666.

span.span: The value in a set operation is less than 100 or greater than 9666.
